text: Health costs are reflective of a standard vaccination protocol including fly control, respiratory vaccine, vitamin A, D, and E, selenium, and a vaccine for rotavirus and coronavirus scours, and E. Coli. Labor costs related to health tasks were compiled into a

labor expense. The total health cost was figured at $9.22 per calf. Fair market prices were assumed on all vaccine and health-related equipment through averaging online prices obtained in January 2019.
